welcome:
Welcome to TicTacToe 1.0! if you don't know the rules...
 LOOK EM' UP!
difficulty_select: Please select Easy Mode (player goes first) or Hard Mode (player goes second). (e/h)
difficulty_change: Would you like to change the difficulty? (y/n)
input_rules:
INPUTS: where you place your mark is determined by the arrangement of your numpad.
 like so:
 7|8|9
 4|5|6
 1|2|3
invalid_bin_answer: I'm sorry, I didn't understand your answer. Please enter
invalid_choice: I'm sorry, that is not a valid choice
enter_ready: Hit enter when ready to begin the game or hit "ctrl + c" to exit the program
